Senior Procurement Officer Job at Federal University of Applied Sciences




        
    

        
        The Federal University of Applied Sciences, Kachia (FUASK), Kaduna State, Nigeria was established by an Act of Parliament of 2025, following President Bola Ahmed Tinubu's assent into law of the bill sponsored by Distinguished Senator (Barr). Sunday Marshall Katung, representing Kaduna South Senatorial District in the 10th Assembly. Earlier in the 8th and 9th Assembly, a similar bill was sponsored by Senator Danjuma Laah for the establishment of a University of Science and Technology. Senator Katung's bill gave a new and specific focus to the University in order to address specific needs relating to access to specialized education and man power needs in Nigeria.
     

            
    



The University inherited the infrastructure of NOK University, which was taken over by the Federal Government in 2024. It is located in kachia town, about 110 kilometers from Kaduna, and 90 km from Kafanchan town in Kaduna State. The University has a land mass of 173 hectares. Kachia is a semi-urban town with mixed population of tribes such as Adara, Jaba, Bajju, Gbagyi, Ikulu and Fulani. It is easily accessible from Abuja, the Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria through Bwari-jere and Kurmin jibrin road (about 180km) or through Abuja-Keffi-Kwoi (about 170km). Kachia town has potential for industrial as well as Agricultural development. There are a few Agro based industries such as Ginger processing plants and Rice mills. There are various military training institutions in Kachia. The paramount ruler of Kachia is known as Agom Kachia.

Applications are invited from suitably qualified candidates for the position below:

Job Position: Senior Procurement Officer

Job Location: Kachia, Kaduna

Requirements


	Candidates must possess a BSc in Accounting, Business Administration or Procurement (or HND at Lower Credit level), with good knowledge of ICT, NYSC discharge/exemption certificate, and evidence of registration with professional body also required.
	Minimum of 6 years of cognate experience.

		Help maintain and strengthen internal control procedures.

Multimedia Designer Job at ResQ-X Limited




        
    

        
        ResQ-X is more than just a roadside assistance service; we are your trusted partner in ensuring safety and reliability on Lagos roads.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Multimedia Designer
Job Location: Ikate, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Hybrid

Job Summary


	We seek a creative Multimedia Designer skilled in both static and motion graphics to strengthen our brand, marketing, and user experience.
	You will create visuals that highlight urgency, reliability, and trust while keeping the brand approachable and user-friendly.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Design motion and static graphics (ads, reels, social posts, infographics, print).
	Translate roadside assistance services into clear, engaging visuals.
	Ensure consistency with brand identity across all platforms.
	Collaborate with marketing and product teams to drive user engagement.
	Stay current with design trends and deliver projects on time.


Qualifications


	Minimum of 3 years of proven experience as a Multimedia/Graphic Designer with a strong portfolio.
	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, CorelDRAW, Figma, and animation tools.
	Familiarity with digital marketing design; UI/UX knowledge is a plus.


Skills & Competencies:


	Strong eye for design, typography, and motion storytelling.
	Creative, detail-oriented, and deadline-driven.
	Excellent collaboration and communication skills.
	Ability to adapt designs for web, mobile, social, and print.


Salary
N250,000 Monthly.
